thread.title: Bobbies on the beat could vanish, warns police watchdog
thread.title_full: Bobbies on the beat could vanish, warns police watchdog

author: David Barrett
title: Bobbies on the beat could vanish, warns police watchdog
text: Law and Order Bobbies on the beat could vanish, warns police watchdog Uniformed police officers less likely to be seen by the public due to widespread flaws in police budget forecasting, say inspectors Her Majesty's Inspectorate of Constabulary warned neighbourhood patrols - or beat bobbies - could become endangered Photo: REX FEATURES By David Barrett , Home Affairs Correspondent 12:01AM BST 20 Oct 2015
